title: AstraZeneca CFO on M&A Strategy and Obesity Market
description: AstraZeneca CFO Aradhana Sarin discusses the company's M&A strategy and weight-loss portfolio with Katie Greifeld at the JPMorgan Health-Care Conference in San Francisco. (Source: Bloomberg)
content: AstraZeneca CFO Aradhana Sarin discusses the company's M&A strategy and weight-loss portfolio with Katie Greifeld at the JPMorgan Health-Care Conference in San Francisco. (Source: Bloomberg)
